page.title: 11ROYAL BRITISH LEGION: BAND
page.content: The aim of the R.B.L.is to raise money for the upkeep of the flats and resthomes that many ex-servicemen occupy. They also raise money for local charities. In 1984 the R.B.L. members in Sutton on Trent wanted to support the youth of the village. It was decided to form a youth band. The band wears the colours of the R.B.L. The band holds social functions in order to raise funds for instruments which the youth of the village are taught to play. A ladies section raises funds for charitable works. The R.B.L. in Sutton is an agency for social events which have a base in charitable causes.
